title: Sri Lanka February 2026
description: An 8-day journey through Sri Lanka — ancient rock fortresses, misty tea country, the famous hill-country train, and colonial Galle Fort by the sea.

activities.title: Flight JD487 — Beijing (PKX) to Colombo
activities.description: Julian's outbound flight from Beijing Daxing. Ryvn arrives on a separate flight (TBD).
activities.tips: Bring a good book — it's a long flight.

activities.title: Land at Colombo (CMB)
activities.description: Arrive at Bandaranaike International Airport. Pick up local SIM card and arrange transfer to hotel.
activities.tips: Get a Dialog or Mobitel SIM at the airport arrivals hall — fast data for cheap.

activities.title: Transfer to Negombo
activities.description: Short 15-minute drive from the airport to the hotel in Negombo.

activities.title: Check in at Jetwing Blue
activities.description: Beachfront hotel right on Negombo Beach. Relax after the long flight.

activities.title: Dinner & Beach Sunset
activities.description: Enjoy fresh seafood at the hotel or walk to a nearby restaurant along Negombo Beach. Catch the sunset over the Indian Ocean.

activities.title: Drive to Sigiriya
activities.description: Scenic 4-hour drive through the Sri Lankan countryside from Negombo to the Cultural Triangle.

activities.title: Sigiriya Rock Fortress
activities.description: Climb the ancient rock fortress — a UNESCO World Heritage Site built in the 5th century. 1,200 steps to the top with stunning views of the surrounding jungle and plains.
activities.tips: Go early to avoid the midday heat. Bring water. The frescoes halfway up are incredible.

activities.title: Lunch
activities.description: Lunch near Sigiriya. Try a traditional Sri Lankan rice and curry spread.

activities.title: Check in at Ceylon Breeze Sigiriya
activities.description: Rest and enjoy the pool after the Sigiriya climb.

activities.title: Drive to Kandy
activities.description: 3-hour drive south from Sigiriya through the hill country to Kandy, Sri Lanka's cultural capital.

activities.title: Temple of the Tooth (Sri Dalada Maligawa)
activities.description: Sacred Buddhist temple housing the relic of the tooth of Buddha. One of the most important pilgrimage sites in the Buddhist world.
activities.tips: Dress modestly — cover shoulders and knees. Remove shoes before entering.

activities.title: Lunch by Kandy Lake
activities.description: Enjoy lunch with views of the scenic Kandy Lake, right in the heart of the city.

activities.title: Udawattakele Forest Reserve
activities.description: A serene forest sanctuary above the Temple of the Tooth. Great for a peaceful walk among ancient trees, birds, and monkeys.

activities.title: Ceylon Tea Museum
activities.description: Learn about Sri Lanka's famous tea industry in this museum housed in a former tea factory. Includes tea tasting.

activities.title: Check in at Cinnamon Citadel Kandy
activities.description: Riverside hotel with beautiful views of the Mahaweli River.

days.title: Day 4 — The Famous Train to Ella

activities.title: Drive to Ambewala Station
activities.description: 2-hour drive from Kandy to Ambewala railway station to catch the famous hill-country train.

activities.title: Train: Ambewala → Ella
activities.description: One of the most beautiful train rides in the world. The train winds through lush green tea plantations, crosses the iconic Nine Arches Bridge, and passes through misty mountain tunnels.
activities.location: Sri Lanka Railways — Hill Country Line
activities.tips: Sit on the right side for the best views. Hang out by the open doors for the full experience (carefully!). Book 2nd class for open windows.

activities.title: Arrive in Ella
activities.description: Welcome to Ella — a small, laid-back mountain town surrounded by tea plantations and waterfalls.

activities.title: Check in at La Casa Bella
activities.description: Settle in for a 2-night stay in Ella.

activities.title: Explore Ella Town
activities.description: Walk around Ella's charming main street. Grab a coffee, browse the shops, and enjoy the mountain views.

activities.title: Tea Estate Visit
activities.description: Visit a working tea estate and factory. See how Ceylon tea is picked, processed, and graded. Includes a tasting session.

activities.title: Nine Arches Bridge
activities.description: Walk to the iconic Nine Arches Bridge — a colonial-era stone viaduct set among jungle and tea fields. Watch the train cross if your timing is right.
activities.tips: Trains cross around 9:15am, 11:00am, and 3:30pm — check the schedule.

activities.title: Lunch in Ella
activities.description: Plenty of great cafes and restaurants in town. Try a kottu roti or a Sri Lankan curry.

activities.title: Little Adam's Peak
activities.description: Easy 45-minute hike to panoramic views of Ella Gap and the surrounding tea country. One of the best viewpoints in the area.

activities.title: Ravana Falls
activities.description: One of Sri Lanka's widest waterfalls, just a short tuk-tuk ride from Ella center.

activities.title: Transfer to Galle
activities.description: Long but scenic 5-hour drive south from the hill country to the coast. The landscape changes dramatically from mountains to tropical coast.

activities.title: Arrive & Check in at The Fort House
activities.description: Boutique hotel inside the historic Galle Fort walls.

activities.title: Galle Fort Rampart Walk
activities.description: Walk along the 400-year-old Dutch colonial fort walls. Beautiful views of the ocean on both sides, especially at sunset.

activities.title: Dutch Reformed Church
activities.description: One of the oldest Protestant churches in Sri Lanka, dating back to 1755. Beautiful colonial architecture.

activities.title: Explore Galle Fort Streets
activities.description: Wander through the charming streets inside the fort. Art galleries, boutique shops, cafes, and colonial architecture everywhere.

activities.title: Sunset & Dinner at the Fort
activities.description: Watch the sunset from the ramparts, then find a restaurant inside the fort for dinner.

activities.title: Breakfast at the Fort
activities.description: Lazy morning breakfast at the hotel or a nearby cafe inside Galle Fort.

activities.title: Beach Day — Unawatuna or Jungle Beach
activities.description: Head to nearby Unawatuna Beach (10 min drive) or the hidden Jungle Beach for a full day of sun, swimming, and relaxation.
activities.tips: Jungle Beach is smaller but more secluded — great for snorkeling.

activities.title: Beachside Lunch
activities.description: Fresh seafood and cold drinks with your feet in the sand.

activities.title: Last Evening in Galle
activities.description: Final sunset from the fort ramparts. Soak it all in.

activities.title: Transfer to Colombo Airport
activities.description: 3-hour drive north along the coastal expressway from Galle to CMB airport.

activities.title: Arrive at Airport
activities.description: Last-minute shopping at the duty-free. Pick up Ceylon tea, spices, and gems as souvenirs.
activities.tips: Grab a last Sri Lankan meal at the airport before departure.

activities.title: Return Flight — Colombo to Beijing
activities.description: Flight departs CMB at 16:20. Lands at Beijing Daxing (PKX) at 01:55+1 the next day.

activities.title: Land at Beijing (PKX) — Next Day
activities.description: Arrive back in Beijing early morning on Feb 22.
activities.tips: Book an airport hotel if you need rest before heading home.
